articles.author: Bill Faries
articles.title: US Issues ‘Worldwide Caution’ for Americans After Attack on Iran - Bloomberg
articles.description: The US State Department issued a “Worldwide Caution” alert for American citizens, flagging the potential of travel disruptions and demonstrations following the US strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities.
articles.content: The US State Department issued a Worldwide Caution alert for American citizens, flagging the potential of travel disruptions and demonstrations following the US strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities.… [+55 chars]
